title: How have libraries changed in your country?

korean: 예전엔 그냥 책만 빌리는 곳이었는데, 지금은 복합 문화 공간이야.
시설이 정말 좋아져서 카페 같은 분위기야.
강연이나 독서 토론회 같은 것도 많이 열려.
어린이 도서관도 따로 있어서 가족 단위로 오기 좋아.
야간 개방하는 곳도 많아져서 직장인들도 이용하기 편해.
전체적으로 접근성과 편의성이 많이 개선된 것 같아.
english: Libraries in Korea have changed a lot from before.
Before, they were just places to borrow books, but now they're complex cultural spaces.
The facilities have improved so much that the atmosphere is like a café.
The chairs and desks are comfortable and the design is pretty.
Digitalization has also progressed a lot.
You can also borrow e-books and audiobooks.
You can also make reservations and renewals through the app.
Many lectures and book discussion groups are held.
There are also separate children's libraries, so it's good for families to come.
Many places have extended night hours, so it's convenient for office workers too.
Overall, I think accessibility and convenience have improved a lot.
